description: This opportunity to investigate in depth a topic of interest, typically culminating in a library research-based paper, is strongly recommended as preparation for PSYCH 398. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: PSYCH 125, at least three courses in the department, and permission of instructor; PSYCH 230 is strongly recommended.
name: IS/
notes: An Independent Study form is required by the last day to add in order to be
officially registered for an Independent Study.
prerequisites: PSYCH 125, at least three courses in the department, and permission of instructor; PSYCH 230 is strongly recommended.
title: Independent Study
